snippet.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2 Game - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Become Spider-Man in the Amazing Spider-Man 2! Experience an action-packed, open-world adventure, as the extraordinary wall-crawler must save New York City from the formidable villain Electro in the midst of a massive villainous gang war! Perform web-slinging, wall-crawling, and fluid aerobic combat like never before on your mobile device! 

Download today on iOS http://gmlft.co/Spidey_iOS 
and Google Play http://gmlft.co/Spidey_Play

Coming soon to Windows Phone! 
 
Official site:   http://gmlft.co/ygameloft.63
Friend us on Facebook:   http://gmlft.co/yfb.63
Facebook game page:   http://gmlft.co/AmazingSpiderMan2MobileGame.123
Follow us on Twitter: http://gmlft.co/ytwitter.63
Visit our blog:   http://gmlft.co/yblog.63
